UseTemplate.Name: ASOBO_GT_Update
ASOBO_GT_Update

MouseRect.CallbackCode: (A:APU PCT RPM, percent) 10 > if{ (>K:APU_OFF_SWITCH) 0 (>L:ToggleAPUSwitch, bool) } els{ (>K:APU_STARTER) 1 (>L:ToggleAPUSwitch, bool) }
(A:General eng1 fuel pump switch,bool) ! (>A:General eng1 fuel pump switch,bool) (K:TOGGLE_ELECT_FUEL_PUMP1,bool) ! (>K:TOGGLE_ELECT_FUEL_PUMP1,bool)
(A:General eng2 fuel pump switch,bool) ! (>A:General eng2 fuel pump switch,bool) (K:TOGGLE_ELECT_FUEL_PUMP2,bool) ! (>K:TOGGLE_ELECT_FUEL_PUMP2,bool)
(A:General eng3 fuel pump switch,bool) ! (>A:General eng3 fuel pump switch,bool) (K:TOGGLE_ELECT_FUEL_PUMP3,bool) ! (>K:TOGGLE_ELECT_FUEL_PUMP3,bool)
(A:General eng4 fuel pump switch,bool) ! (>A:General eng4 fuel pump switch,bool) (K:TOGGLE_ELECT_FUEL_PUMP4,bool) ! (>K:TOGGLE_ELECT_FUEL_PUMP4,bool)
(M:Event) 'LeftSingle' scmp 0 == if{ (L:CPIT_WINDOW, percent) 0 != if{ 0 (>L:CPIT_WINDOW, percent) } els{ 100 (>L:CPIT_WINDOW, percent) } }

MouseRect.TooltipText: %((L:PARA DOORL, bool))%{if}PARA DOOR OPEN L%{else}PARA DOOR CLOSED L%{end}
%((L:PARA DOORR, bool))%{if}PARA DOOR OPEN R%{else}PARA DOOR CLOSED R%{end}
%((L:INT DOOR, bool))%{if}INT DOOR OPEN%{else}INT DOOR CLOSED%{end}

MouseRect.CallbackCode: (M:Event) 'LeftSingle' scmp 0 == if{ 1 (>L:C17_STALL_TEST, bool) } (M:Event) 'LeftRelease' scmp 0 == if{ 0 (>L:C17_STALL_TEST, bool) }

MouseRect.TooltipText: %((L:C17_HUD_RaBa, bool))%{if}(HUD) USE RADIO ALT%{else}(HUD) USE BARO ALT%{end}

MouseRect.CallbackCode: (M:Event) 'LeftSingle' scmp 0 == if{ 1 (>L:switch_lights_test, bool) } (M:Event) 'LeftRelease' scmp 0 == if{ 0 (>L:switch_lights_test, bool) }

(M:Event) 'LeftSingle' scmp 0 == if{ 1 (>L:MFDENG2,enum) (L:MFDX2 mode,enum) 3 == if{ 4 (>L:MFDX2 mode,enum) } els{ (L:MFDX2 mode,enum) 4 == if{ 5 (>L:MFDX2 mode,enum) } els{ 3 (>L:MFDX2 mode,enum) } } } (M:Event) 'LeftRelease' scmp 0 == if{ 0 (>L:MFDENG2,enum) }

(M:Event) 'LeftSingle' scmp 0 == if{ 1 (>L:MFDENG1,enum) (L:MFDX1 mode,enum) 3 == if{ 4 (>L:MFDX1 mode,enum) } els{ (L:MFDX1 mode,enum) 4 == if{ 5 (>L:MFDX1 mode,enum) } els{ 3 (>L:MFDX1 mode,enum) } } } (M:Event) 'LeftRelease' scmp 0 == if{ 0 (>L:MFDENG1,enum) }

(M:Event) 'LeftSingle' scmp 0 == if{ 1 (>L:MFDENG3,enum) (L:MFDX3 mode,enum) 3 == if{ 4 (>L:MFDX3 mode,enum) } els{ (L:MFDX3 mode,enum) 4 == if{ 5 (>L:MFDX3 mode,enum) } els{ 3 (>L:MFDX3 mode,enum) } } } (M:Event) 'LeftRelease' scmp 0 == if{ 0 (>L:MFDENG3,enum) }

(M:Event) 'LeftSingle' scmp 0 == if{ 1 (>L:MFDENG4,enum) (L:MFDX4 mode,enum) 3 == if{ 4 (>L:MFDX4 mode,enum) } els{ (L:MFDX4 mode,enum) 4 == if{ 5 (>L:MFDX4 mode,enum) } els{ 3 (>L:MFDX4 mode,enum) } } } (M:Event) 'LeftRelease' scmp 0 == if{ 0 (>L:MFDENG4,enum) }
